thread.section_title: MirrorLot Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MirrorLot | mirrorlot.com | 3 of 38
thread.title: Jennifer

author: Jennifer
title: Jennifer
text: We recently remodeled 2 of our bathrooms. I was having trouble finding mirrors in the dimensions that I wanted. MirrorLot's customization is exactly what I was looking for. The frame options were beautiful and the quality is top notch. When we received the mirrors, one had shattered during delivery. MirrorLot quickly replaced the mirror. Now both are hanging beautifully in our bathrooms. Thank you for helping us complete our remodel project!
